body:
Hello guys! I am going to start a youtube channel around Avicus and other servers. This is my first video called Road To Top 50.
It is going to be a series where I upload public matches in DTM. I am currently 97th but I will work my way up to top 50.

Here is the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KBpHqY-uU7o 

Give it some feedback so I can know what I should do better.
body_tagged:

title: Road To Top 50!

replies.body:
Gl :)
You could maybe do a montage of you breaking the monuments, and not like the full rush, it gets boring
replies.body_tagged:
Gl :)

replies.body: Good luck on getting Top 50, I'm sure you will  make it! You are really good at pvp :)!
